patchNotes.title: Version 2.3 - Shadow's Edge
patchNotes.imageAlt: Shadow's Edge Update - Dark realm gates open

sections.title: New Features
items: Added new Shadow Realm dungeon with 5 challenging boss encounters
Introduced Dark Covenant faction with unique questline and rewards
New weapon type: Void Scythes with special soul-reaping mechanics
Added transmog system for customizing armor appearance

sections.title: Bugfixes
items: Fixed issue where players could fall through the world in Crimson Wastes
Resolved crash when opening inventory during boss transitions
Fixed Oath Breaker achievement not unlocking properly

items: Winter Solstice event with limited-time frostbound weapons
New ice-themed cosmetics and mount skins available
Frostborne enemies now spawn in northern regions
Seasonal achievements and titles added

sections.title: Balance Changes
items: Reduced damage of Blood Oath spell by 15%
Increased movement speed of all heavy armor sets by 8%
Adjusted boss scaling for groups of 3+ players

patchNotes.title: Version 2.0 - The Reckoning

sections.title: Major Update
items: Complete combat system overhaul with new combo mechanics
Raised level cap from 50 to 75 with new skill trees
Added PvP arena system with ranked matchmaking
New endgame raid: The Obsidian Citadel (10-player)
Introduced Prestige system for max-level characters
Major graphics upgrade with ray tracing support

sections.title: Bugfixes

patchNotes.title: Version 1.8 - Crimson Moon

sections.title: New Features
items: Blood Moon event now occurs every 7 in-game days

sections.title: Balance Changes
items: Nerfed Shadow Step ability cooldown to 12 seconds
Buffed defensive stats on plate armor by 20%
Adjusted drop rates for rare materials
